programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Young Bheema refuses to accept that his family be slaves for a wealthier family and begins challenging the authorities above him, getting him into trouble.(n)

programme.title: Gurudev
programme.desc: A police inspector and and his friend have grown up together, but the inspector's father works as the right-hand man of a crime boss who also happens to be the friend's father.(n)

programme.title: Shukriya
programme.desc: An angel (Aftab Shivdasani) warns a businessman (Anupam Kher) that he has but four days to live.(n)

programme.title: Keemat
programme.desc: Ajay and Dev feel guilty after they accidentally kill a young man. When they visit the boy's family but cannot bring themselves to speak the truth, they decide to stay and make amends in secret.(n)

programme.title: Ragini MMS
programme.desc: A young couple (Raj Kumar Yadav, Kainaz Motivala) spend a romantic weekend in a house rigged with hidden cameras that record every moment of their time there.(n)

programme.title: Inteha
programme.desc: Nandini comes to stay with her step-sister, Tina. Gradually, they warm up to each other, but things turn sour when Nandini disapproves of Tina's boyfriend, Ranbir.(n)

programme.title: Munna Maange Memsaab
programme.desc: A boy from a small village grows up thinking he will marry someone special.(n)

programme.title: Anokhi Ada
programme.desc: After Lalaji's son, Rakesh, dies, Gopal takes over his business. He woos Neeta and also brings Rakesh's doppelganger, just so that he can swindle Lalaji's wealth.(n)

programme.title: Dil Ne Jise Apna Kahaa
programme.desc: A widower (Salman Khan) is unaware that the woman (Bhumika Chawla) who loves him was the recipient of his wife's heart in a transplant operation.(n)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Two men help a young woman get revenge after her family is killed in a massacre.(n)

programme.title: Shaadi Mein Zaroor Aana
programme.desc: Aarti, a bright, ambitious woman, is on the cusp of making a great career for herself. She agrees to marry Satyendar, but flees the arrangement when she learns she will not be allowed to work once they are wed.(n)

programme.title: Koyelaanchal
programme.desc: A thug is sent to intimidate a government official and accidentally kills his wife.(n)

programme.title: Ek Aur Bhool Bhulaiyaa
programme.desc: A young couple move into an ancient mansion that is believed to be haunted and soon after, sinister things begin to happen.(n)

programme.title: Sikka
programme.desc: Two close friends, Vijay and Pranlal, decide to cement their friendship into a relationship.(n)

programme.title: Mast
programme.desc: A young man (Aftab Shivdasani) goes out of his way to meet a film star (Urmila Matondkar), an obsession that caused him to flunk his final exams.(n)

programme.title: Krantiveer
programme.desc: A crusading journalist (Dimple Kapadia) inspires an aimless man (Nana Patekar) to fight for the rights of the poor.(n)

programme.title: Yeh Hai Mumbai Meri Jaan
programme.desc: Raju moves to Mumbai with the hope of becoming a successful businessman, but after arriving in the big city, he finds himself robbed, jailed and unemployed.(n)

programme.title: Daraar
programme.desc: A hero comes to the aid of an Indian woman (Juhi Chawla) who rebels against a cruel, possessive husband (Arbaaz Khan).(n)

programme.title: Kasoor
programme.desc: A lawyer (Lisa Ray) walks a dangerous line by falling in love with her client (Aftab Shivdasani), a wealthy man accused of murdering his wife.(n)

programme.title: Utthaan
programme.desc: Prashant and Kira join forces with TV reporters and journalists to expose corrupt politicians; after initial success, Prashant decides to run for office, much to the chagrin of his allies.(n)

programme.title: Bas Ek Pal
programme.desc: A fight over a woman results in Nikhil accidentally shooting his friend who is left paralyzed. Nikhil maintains that he is innocent, but cannot find the mysterious woman to help him prove it; however, later a lawyer tries to bail him out.(n)

programme.desc: A boy from a small village grows up thinking he will marry someone special.(n)

programme.title: Pyar Ke Kabil
programme.desc: Twins meet for the first time years after their parents divorce.(n)

programme.title: Hote Hote Pyaar Ho Gaya
programme.desc: A couple in love marry the partners chosen by their respective parents with a plan to divorce them and get back together later, but one day they find out that the people they are married to are meeting with each other.(n)

programme.desc: A lawyer (Lisa Ray) walks a dangerous line by falling in love with her client (Aftab Shivdasani), a wealthy man accused of murdering his wife.(n)

programme.title: 18.11 A Code of Secrecy
programme.desc: A software engineer creates a program that triggers a warning text to everyone in the vicinity whenever a bomb explodes. As he continues to develop it, corrupt enemies try to snatch it from him.(n)

programme.title: Krishna Arjun
programme.desc: After hearing the news of his mother's death, a man travels home to find that his brother has been arrested for rape and murder and he sets out to find out why.(n)

programme.title: Mela
programme.desc: Two men help a young woman get revenge after her family is killed in a massacre.(n)

programme.title: Naach Govinda Naach
programme.desc: An aspiring dancer (Govinda) finally gets his wish to follow his dream.(n)

programme.title: Poorna
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl from Telangana becomes the youngest female in history to climb Mount Everest.(n)

programme.title: Blackmail
programme.desc: A criminal kidnaps the son of the cop who put him behind bars. The ransom he demands doesn't involve money, but something much more difficult to part with.(n)

programme.title: Dhokha
programme.desc: A police officer (Muzammil Ibrahim) becomes a terrorist suspect after a deadly bombing at a club.(n)

programme.title: Jahan Tum Le Chalo
programme.desc: A journalist cum social activist and a photographer are in a relationship, but the latter refuses to marry her, until a good-looking young man falls in love with his girlfriend, making him feel insecure and jealous.(n)

programme.title: Pighalta Aasman
programme.desc: A businesswoman travels to Kashmir to settle a property issue; she falls in love with a man there. Her best friend also falls in love with the same person, this changes their relationship forever.(n)

programme.title: Chameli Ki Shaadi
programme.desc: In a small town, Charandas intends to marry Chameli, but he is poor and his plans clash with those of his father and those of his wrestling trainer.(n)

programme.title: Satya
programme.desc: An East Indian gangster reflects on his lifestyle after he falls in love.(n)

programme.title: Roja
programme.desc: An innocent wife's world is shattered when militants kidnap her husband, a government official.(n)

programme.title: Rahasya
programme.desc: Dr. Sachin Mahajan becomes accused of killing his own daughter. He protests his innocence even as the evidence stacks up against him, however, a CBI inspector unfolds the mystery and reveals the true murderer.(n)

programme.desc: A criminal kidnaps the son of the cop who put him behind bars. The ransom he demands doesn't involve money, but something much more difficult to part with.(n)

programme.title: Showbiz
programme.desc: An angry singer (Tushar Jalota) tries to expose ruthless and manipulative paparazzi.(n)

programme.title: Blue Oranges
programme.desc: Nilesh is investigating the murder of a rich alcoholic woman. He investigates a bunch of suspects, including the murdered woman's ex-lover, before concluding the truth.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: A man (Amitabh Bachchan) seeks revenge against a criminal who framed his older brother (Ajit).(n)

programme.title: Haseena Maan Jayegi
programme.desc: Separated from their wealthy father and each other, two brothers (Sanjay Dutt, Govinda) try to win the hearts of their dream girls.(n)

programme.title: Rahasya
programme.desc: Dr. Sachin Mahajan becomes accused of killing his own daughter. He protests his innocence even as the evidence stacks up against him, however, a CBI inspector unfolds the mystery and reveals the true murderer.(n)

programme.title: Saaya
programme.desc: After his wife (Tara Sharma) dies, a doctor (John Abraham) keeps seeing her image and refuses to believe she is dead.(n)

programme.title: Jashnn
programme.desc: A young singer (Adhyayan Suman) falls in love with the sister (Anjana Sukhani) of a production mogul, who tries to stop the romance.(n)

programme.title: Majaal
programme.desc: Vijay falls in love with Sadhana and marries her. But their marriage hits rock bottom when, on several occasions, Vijay is disrespected by his in-laws.(n)

programme.title: Yeh Zindagi Ka Safar
programme.desc: A singer (Amisha Patel) finds out she was adopted when the editor (Gulshan Grover) of a struggling tabloid publishes the story.(n)

programme.title: Samay: When Time Strikes
programme.desc: ACP Malvika Chauhan investigates a series of murders where the killer leaves a similar pattern after murdering his victims.(n)

programme.title: Gangster
programme.desc: Simran, who relocates to Seoul, is distraught when Daya, a gangster, re-enters her life. She has to make a choice between him and her lover Akash, who is a singer at an Indian restaurant.(n)

programme.title: Ek Se Bure Do
programme.desc: Two petty thieves face-off against gangsters, bandits and police after forging a treasure map.(n)

programme.title: Four Pillars Of Basement
programme.desc: Samir, a mall security officer, has a crush on Riya, who works at the mall. After his twin brother traps Riya in a basement, he must rescue her.(n)

programme.title: Dhoop
programme.desc: After their beloved son becomes a casualty of war, a grieving couple (Om Puri, Revathi) try to keep his memory alive.(n)

programme.title: Chor Machaye Shor ()
programme.desc: A thief pretends to be a cop in order to recover his diamond from a site that has been converted into the police headquarters. Although he becomes a favourite of the ACP, a colleague gets suspicious.(n)

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: Raju, a porter, falls in love with a rich girl. He dupes her father and they marry. Watch the comedy starring Govinda and Karishma Kapoor. Release Year: 1995 Director: David Dhawan.(n)

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: A family drama interspersed with humour and intense romance of a dynamic, handsome man who falls for beautiful model. Release Year: 2006 Director: K. S. Adiyaman.(n)

programme.title: Pyaar Ke Side Effects
programme.desc: A romantic comedy where two strangers meet and disappear, only to unite months later in the most unexpected way. Release Year: 2006 Director: Saket Chaudhary Awards: World Fest-Houston International Film Festival- Remi Award for Creative Excellence.(n)

programme.title: Tubelight
programme.desc: Tubelight is an entertaining family drama set in a small town in the hills of northern India, and tells the story of one man's love for his family and his unshakeable belief in himself. Release Year: 2017 Director: Kabir Khan.(n)

programme.title: Dabangg
programme.desc: Chulbul Pandey is a fearless, sometimes crooked, cop who has a troubled relationship with his step-father and step-brother. Release Year: 2010 Director: Abhinav Kashyap Awards: Best Screenplay: Abhinav Kashyap, Dilip Shukla, Best Action: Fefsi Vijayan, Be.(n)

programme.title: Kabali
programme.desc: The story depicts the eternal victory of good over evil. The protagonist fights to bring justice to the people who suffer. Release Year: 2016 Director: Pa. Ranjith.(n)

programme.title: 7 1/2 Phere More Than A Wedding
programme.desc: Asmi, in a bid to save her career, blackmails Manoj and installs hidden cameras in his house, keeping his family in the dark. He realises his folly when all the family secrets start tumbling out.(n)

programme.title: Koffee With Karan S04
programme.desc: Karan Johar gets up close and personal with various celebrities and discusses their lives.(n)

programme.title: Love Ka Taddka
programme.desc: Aditya and Riya fall in love and get married. Complications arise when they find out that the society they moved into is strictly vegetarian and they are meat-lovers. How will they manage?(n)

programme.title: Chor Ke Ghar Chor
programme.desc: When an idol of Devi Maa, which brings immense luck to its owner, is found after many years, it causes a lot of mayhem between two noble families that wish to keep it for themselves. Release Year: 1978 Director: Vijay Sadanah Awards: Best Comedian/Comedie.(n)

programme.title: Chor Ke Ghar Chor
programme.desc: When an idol of Devi Maa, which brings immense luck to its owner, is found after many years, it causes a lot of mayhem between two noble families that wish to keep it for themselves. Release Year: 1978 Director: Vijay Sadanah Awards: Best Comedian/Comedie.(n)

programme.title: De Dana Dan
programme.desc: Nitin and Anjali love each other but cannot marry because Nitin isn't rich enough to receive consent from her father. Release Year: 2009 Director: Priyadarshan.(n)

programme.title: Dear Dad
programme.desc: A teenager and his father form a special bond with each other while on an unplanned road trip from their home in Delhi. Release Year: 2016 Director: Tanuj Bhramar.(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang
programme.desc: Bang Bang - A youth based show with latest trends in new media Release Year: 2014 Director: Siddharth Anand Awards: Surfers' Choice Award - Best Music Video--Bang Bang.(n)

programme.title: Mission Mangal
programme.desc: Based on an extraordinary true story of India's finest scientists who rose above all the hardships and failures to make India the only country to reach Mars in its first attempt.(n)

programme.title: Bang Bang
programme.desc: Bang Bang - A youth based show with latest trends in new media Release Year: 2014 Director: Siddharth Anand Awards: Surfers' Choice Award - Best Music Video--Bang Bang.(n)

programme.title: Bioscopewala
programme.desc: 2018 Drama film is the story of Rehmat Khan, a man from Kabul, who used to show films to children through his Bioscope. It stars Danny Denzongpa, Geetanjali Thapa, Adil Hussain and Tisca Chopra.(n)

programme.title: Ajnabee
programme.desc: Raj and Priya marry and move to Switzerland and befriend neighbours Vicky and Sonia. Sonia is found murdered and Raj is suspected. Release Year: 2001 Director: Abbas Alibhai Burmawalla Awards: Awards of the International Indian Film Academy: Best Performance In Negative Role: Akshay Kumar. Filmfare Awards: Best Villian : Akshay Kumar.(n)

programme.title: Bal Ganesh 3
programme.desc: A movie filled with action and thriller three times more this time! Watch our dear Bal Ganesh fight with the evil monsters and save the earth.(n)

programme.title: 1971: Beyond Borders ()
programme.desc: The story of the 1971 war between India and Pakistan is told from the perspective of a soldier.(n)

programme.title: 1971: Beyond Borders ()
programme.desc: The story of the 1971 war between India and Pakistan is told from the perspective of a soldier.(n)

programme.title: Gali Gali Chor Hai
programme.desc: Story of a common man, his encounters with politics and corruption in everyday life and what it takes for him to deal with such issues. Release Year: 2012 Director: Rumi Jaffery.(n)

programme.title: Buddha Mil Gaya
programme.desc: Two men find an elderly millionaire who had gone missing and take him home with plans to get rich off him. But when his partners are found dead, all clues point towards the duo. Release Year: 1971 Director: Hrishikesh Mukherjee.(n)

programme.title: Jolly LLB 2
programme.desc: A blunt, compassionate, struggling lawyer moves from Kanpur to Lucknow to pursue his dream of making it big-time. Release Year: 2017 Director: Subhash Kapoor.(n)

programme.title: Dil Tera Aashiq
programme.desc: Vijay falls in love with Soniya, a dance instructor. His uncle Thakur, is drawn towards Savitri Devi, impersonated by Soniya, a governess Release Year: 1993 Director: Lawrence D'Souza.(n)

programme.title: Son Of Sardaar
programme.desc: Returning to his parents' village, a man Ajay Devgan becomes the latest target in a long-standing family feud. The film also stars Sanjay Dutt, Juhi Chawla and Sonakshi Sinha. programme.title: Savdhaan India - Naya Adhyay
programme.desc: An initiative to narrate riveting crime stories through the investigative lens of police. The stories are handpicked from various sections of the country, making it relevant to the audience.(n)

programme.title: Kartik Purnima
programme.desc: An inquisitive Kartik hires a detective to gather information about Vicky. While Purnima longs for her mother, Vicky brews a vicious plan against her.(n)

programme.title: Kartik Purnima
programme.desc: Purnima's story like that of Cinderella. However, besides a cruel stepmom, she must fight the beauty stereotypes as well. Enter Kartik who loves Poornima dearly, but with they have a fairy-tale ending?(n)

programme.title: The Adventures Of Hatim
programme.desc: Hatim was raised by the King and Queen of Yemen. He possesses unique powers and his ultimate mission finds him against evil sorcerer Zargaam.(n)

programme.title: Savdhaan India - Naya Adhyay
programme.desc: The show deals with real-life crimes stories of murder, kidnapping, domestic violence, fraud, robbery, forgery, rape, sexual assault and other crimes.(n)

programme.title: Radhakrishn - Aghasur Adhyaay
programme.desc: Aghasura follows Kansa's orders to kill Krishna and transforms into a giant serpent. He manages to swallow Krishna and his friends but Krishna increases in size and bursts through Aghasura's body.(n)

programme.title: Salaam E Ishq
programme.desc: Berkisah tentang 6 kelompok orang dari latar belakang yang berbeda, dan yang saling tidak peduli terhadap satu sama lain. Namun akhirnya mereka bersatu karena takdir, nasib, dan cinta.(n)

programme.title: Bombay To Bangkok
programme.desc: Seorang koki bernama Shankar menemukan sebuah kantong penuh uang milik sang penjahat lokal. Ia melarikan diri ke Bangkok dan bertemu dengan Jasmine di sebuah panti pijat dan jatuh cinta kepadanya.(n)

programme.title: Gangaa- Drama Ominibus
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang janda muda bernama Gangaa, yang kehilangan suami dan ayahnya pada hari pernikahannya sendiri. Ayah Gangaa dan suaminya terbunuh dalam kerusuhan di tepi sungai Gangga di Varanasi.(n)

programme.title: Badhaai Ho Badhaai
programme.desc: Raja berusaha menyatukan dua keluarga yang berseteru dan saat situasi mereda, mereka menekannya untuk menikah. Ia mengaku telah menikah dengan Banto, yang kemudian tiba-tiba datang dan mengaku sebagai istrinya.(n)

programme.title: Kiss Kis Ko
programme.desc: Sekelompok pemuda membentuk sebuah grup musik dan memutuskan untuk berkarir dengan serius. Masalah terjadi ketika harus menyertakan seorang gadis dalam kelompok karena publik tertarik melihat wanita muda seksi sehingga mereka harus mengubah nama grup.(n)

programme.title: Luck By Chance
programme.desc: Vikram datang ke Mumbai untuk menjadi seorang aktor dan jatuh cinta pada Sona, seorang aktris yang sedang memperjuangkan kariernya. Kesalahpahaman terjadi saat Vikram mendapat peran utama.(n)

programme.title: Kisah Di Begusarai
programme.desc: Bertempat di tanah ini, Bihar bercerita tentang seorang anggota keluarga Thakur yang bersatu ketika berbagai masalah muncul dan mengancam keberadaan mereka. Di tempat ini peluru berbicara lebih baik daripada kata-kata.(n)

programme.title: Desi Boyz
programme.desc: Dua orang sahabat kehilangan pekerjaan mereka. Namun, mereka akhirnya berpisah setelah identitas mereka sebagai lelaki penghibur terbongkar.(n)

programme.title: Teri Meri Kahaani
programme.desc: Cinta sejati antara pasangan pada tahun 1910, 1960 dan 2012. Cinta mereka begitu kuat bahkan takdir ingin menyatukan mereka.(n)

programme.title: Issaq
programme.desc: Film yang diadaptasi dari kisah Romeo dan Juliet ini berlatar di kota Varanasi, di jantung negara bagian Uttar Pradesh, lengkap dengan gerakan gerilyawan komunis, para mafia penguasa tambang pasir dan tentunya kisah cinta abadi.(n)

programme.title: Banjo
programme.desc: Seorang pemain banjo mencari ketenaran, kesuksesan dan penghargaan.(n)

programme.title: Kekasih Unik
programme.desc: Naren dan Pooja, terpisah. Naren belajar psikologi, lebih di dalam kelas pikiran dan jiwanya daripada kuliah rata-rata, Naren bahkan tidak membaca berita itu.(n)

programme.title: Aroma Kehidupan
programme.desc: Kisah berlatar di Delhi dan menggambarkan perjalanan seorang ibu rumah tangga Mehek dan hasratnya untuk memasak.(n)

programme.title: Gangaa
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah tentang seorang janda muda bernama Gangaa, yang kehilangan suami dan ayahnya pada hari pernikahannya sendiri. Ayah Gangaa dan suaminya terbunuh dalam kerusuhan di tepi sungai Gangga di Varanasi.(n)

programme.title: Nirmala's Spice World
programme.desc: Petualangan kuliner yang membawa penonton ke dunia rempah-rempah eksotis dari seluruh dunia. Nirmala Narine, mengungkapkan rahasia kuno rempah-rempah.(n)

programme.title: Ghanchakkar
programme.desc: Seorang pembobol lemari besi mengaku hilang ingatan saat dua orang penjahat mendatanginya dan meminta upah mereka atas aksi perampokan bank yang mereka lakukan dulu.(n)

programme.title: Asambhav
programme.desc: Ketika Presiden India diculik oleh teroris di Locarno, Swiss, seorang agen rahasia dikirim untuk menyelamatkannya. Dengan bantuan seorang penyanyi, ia melakukan hal yang tampaknya mustahil demi menyelesaikan misinya.(n)

programme.title: Cheeni Kum
programme.desc: Buddhadev Gupta, seorang koki berusia 64 tahun, jatuh cinta dengan seorang insinyur perangkat lunak dengan usia 30 tahun yang bernama Nina. Namun, masa depan mereka menjadi tidak menentu.(n)

programme.title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
programme.desc: Setelah jatuh cinta, tiga teman sekamar mengalami perubahan dalam hidup mereka.(n)

programme.title: Zee Rishtey Awards 2019
programme.desc: The Zee Rishtey Awards adalah acara penghargaan tahunan yang dipersembahkan oleh Zee TV untuk mengenali dan menghormati popularitas karakter yang diperankan oleh para aktor di sinetron India yang ditayangkan di Zee TV.(n)
